repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.6-alpine

RUN set -e -x ; \
        apk add --no-cache gcc python3-dev musl-dev ; \
        pip install --no-cache-dir nameko

RUN set -e -x ;\
        mkdir /app ;\
        adduser -S app

ADD config.yaml /app/
ADD healthcheck.py /app/
ADD aga_exploit.py /app/

RUN set -e -x ;\
        chown -R app /app

USER app
WORKDIR /app
EXPOSE 5000
CMD nameko run --config config.yaml healthcheck
